headline: Your Favorite Spices May Get a Bit More Expensive Soon. Here's the Reason Why
summary: McCormick and the parent company of Dash and Spice Islands are increasing prices, the companies said.

headline: McCormick: 'Buy' The Dip Opportunity Is Here (Upgrade)
summary: McCormick & Company, Incorporated is rated a Buy due to resilient volume growth and steady market share gains. Learn more about MKC stock here.

headline: McCormick Q4 Earnings Lag Estimates, Organic Sales Grow
summary: MKC's fourth-quarter earnings miss estimates, but organic growth improves on gains in Consumer and Flavor Solutions.

headline: CEOs Wary of a Jittery US Consumer as Global Tensions Intensify
summary: Delta Air Lines Inc. struck a cautious tone on profits amid geopolitical uncertainty, while United Airlines Holdings Inc. warned that global tensions could weigh on travel demand.  Meanwhile, executives at consumer staples giants Procter & Gamble Co. and McCormick & Co. said shoppers remain cautious.  Signs of strain are lingering in industrial sectors as reports from distributor Fastenal Co. and logistics company JB Hunt Transport Services Inc. disappointed investors.

headline: Why I'm Calling McCormick A Speculative Buy After The Selloff
summary: McCormick & Company, Incorporated Q4 sales rose 3%, cash flow stays solid, but tariffs and inflation pressure margins as valuation is high. Click for more on MKC.

headline: McCormick Q4 Earnings: Shares Near 52-Week Lows Present Attractive Opportunity
summary: McCormick (MKC) Q4 results were mixed but positive; shares are down ~16.5% and sold off post-earnings.

headline: MKC Q4 Deep Dive: Margin Pressures Offset Modest Sales Growth as Guidance Clouds Outlook
summary: Food flavoring company McCormick (NYSE:MKC) reported Q4 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 2.9% year on year to $1.85 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.86 per share was 1.8% below analysts’ consensus estimates.
